turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: So you see, the point and the theme of the film is kept intact. And of course, the MPAA didn't cut out any of the graphic violence. What did you think?

turns.speaker: CARTMAN
turns.text: Oh man, I'm gonna need a cherry pie to get the taste of ass out of my mouth from that piece of shit movie.

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Eric, you're not watching your mouth!

turns.speaker: CARTMAN
turns.text: You get me Cheesy Poofs with the delightful cheddar crunch, and I'll watch my fucking mouth!

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Eric!!!!  You need to be rehabilitated. Help me to help you!

turns.speaker: CARTMAN
turns.text: Help yourself prickfuck!

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: I am not a prickfuck, mkay? You little asshole!

turns.speaker: CARTMAN
turns.text: Thank God, that sucked ass.

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Uh, except for you Eric. I'm afraid you need to work more on not saying the F word and the N word.

turns.speaker: CARTMAN
turns.text: The N word?

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Norwegian Ass Raper.

turns.speaker: CARTMAN
turns.text: Oh yeah.

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: The rest of you are graduated. You can go home today.

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Wendy, Mkay, if you want to start getting political, I'll throw your skinny little butt right back into rehab. Mkay?

turns.speaker: CARTMAN
turns.text: HOW THE FUCK CAN YOU NOT GRADUATE ME?! DOES THAT MEAN I HAVE TO STAY HERE?!

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: No, Eric... I'm afraid it's phase two for you...

turns.speaker: CARTMAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Young man, you will tell Peincipal Victoria THIS INSTANT where you heard all these horrible phrases!

turns.speaker: CARTMAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: You bastards.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: This is it! The time for action is NOW!! Something must be done! This is like a spreading rash! They're pulling out our children's brains and filling them with trash! Can't you see what this is leading to? A world of smut and sex and poo! I believe the good fight has begun! Something must be done!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: What was that word, young man!?

turns.speaker: CARTMAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: Oh, he said rim job.  It's when someone licks your ass for-

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: I know what it is!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Kyle?!

turns.speaker: CARTMAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: Eric?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: We can't, we're on a hunger strike.

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: A hunger strike? For what?

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: Ha! Is the Pope Catholic?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: I don't know.

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: Children, I know ALL there is to know about women.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: What's going on, Chef?

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: Something big, children.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Look at that!

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: It's that v-chip thing that's inside you, Eric!  The polarity must have been reversed by the electric chair!

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: Hello there, children!!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Hey, Chef.

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: How would like some Salisbury Steak with buttered noodles?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: What's the secret to making a woman happy?

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: Oh that's easy, you just gotta find the clitoris.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Huh?

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: Oops, I guess you haven't got that far in your anatomy class, huh?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: No, what does that mean, find the clitoris?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Chef, what does it mean that we're at war?

turns.speaker: CHEF
turns.text: It's... It's not good children.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Who are you, kid?

turns.speaker: GREGORY
turns.text: My name is Gregory. I have been Wendy's counter-cousin for some time.

turns.speaker: GREGORY
turns.text: Viva la Resistance.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Oh no, it's that kid.

turns.speaker: GREGORY
turns.text: This is the place--

turns.speaker: GREGORY
turns.text: May I?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: WE'RE going! WE started La Resistance to save Terrance and Phillip! We're going!

turns.speaker: GREGORY
turns.text: This will be very dangerous... Are you quite sure?

turns.speaker: IKE
turns.text: Purpre mama!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Be quiet, Ike! The movie's starting!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Donkey raping shit eater.

turns.speaker: IKE
turns.text: Doky maping she deeder!!!

turns.speaker: IKE
turns.text: Ber dada!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Get out of here Ike, you're too young for this stuff!

turns.speaker: IKE
turns.text: Papa mama simi.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: You stay up here in the attic, Ike. Don't make any noises or nothing, okay?

turns.speaker: IKE
turns.text: Uhh...

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Goodnight, Ike, we're all going to bed.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Yes I am!

turns.speaker: IKE
turns.text: Baba mama!

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: MMMMMPHPHPHPHP!!!!!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: Fallen one... We have such sights to show you!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: I am Satan. I am your God, now.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: MPH RM!!!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: What are you doing?! Get on with your misery!

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mph rmph rm rmph rm?

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: Him? I don't know... He can be nice... sometimes.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mph rmph rm rmph rm.

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: What do you mean?! I could leave him if I wanted to!

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mph rm. Rmph rm rmph rm.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mph rmph rm!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: Get everyone in hell ready. When the blood of Terrance and Phillip spills, the day is ours!

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mph mph.

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: Then move out of the way.

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: Very well, then. I will put an end to the war as your wish and make everything as it was before the war started. But you Kenny, must remain dead.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mph rm.

turns.speaker: SADDAM HUSSEIN
turns.text: Hey, relax Satan. Don't get all worked up. You're gonna give yourself an ulcer again.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mrph mprph!!

turns.speaker: SADDAM HUSSEIN
turns.text: What? What do you mean you don't belong here? Relax guy, hell is for children.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mrph mprhm mm rmph!

turns.speaker: SADDAM HUSSEIN
turns.text: A deal? You wanna make a deal with the devil. Well sure, deals are mounds o' fun.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mph rmph rm rmph rmph rm!

turns.speaker: SADDAM HUSSEIN
turns.text: Oh, you want out of hell, huh?

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Mrph?

turns.speaker: SADDAM HUSSEIN
turns.text: I wouldn't bullshit you kid! Snacky Smores are now available in stores everywhere! No biggie!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Kyle, you take your little brother out to play with you!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Aw, ma!!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Do as I say, Kyle!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Terrance and Phillip, you are under arrest for working in America without the proper documents! WE GOT YOU!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Dude, what the hell is going on?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Boys, we have to have a difficult discussion.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: We already know what you did. We saw it on television.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: You boys need help.  There are rehab centers that specialize in treating people with chronic addictions to bad language.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: No... The General is right.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: MOM!!!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Boobie... This is the only way you're ever going to learn. I have an opportunity here to teach you about consequences.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: YOU GOTTA BE FUCKING KIDDING ME!!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: KYLE BROVLOFSKI, YOU WATCH YOUR LANGUAGE!!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Who is it?

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: Uhh... I'm here for La Resistance.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: What's the password?

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: Uhh... I don't know.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Guess.

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: Uhh... Bacon.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: SHIT!

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: FREEZE!!

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: So... We must free more Canadian prizoners?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Yeah, I guess.

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: America... She iz a beetch that sheets on her own children.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Oh my God...

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: God? ...Let me tell you something about God... He is ze biggest bitch of zem all.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Do you see them?  Do you see Terrance and Phillip?

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: No. Zey must have zem inside. We will have to dig.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: That's gonna take a long time!

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: Time? Did time matter to the Revolutionists who were forced to eat their own shit while dying in the dungeons of ze King?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Dude, we don't have watches.

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: Sheet.  Did you bring ze mirror?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: What's a butfor?

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: For pooping, silly.

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: Now listen carefully. Stan and Kyle, you stand watch here and await my return. If any guards come by, make a sound like a dying giraffe.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: What's a dying giraffe sound like?

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: Gwpaapa. Gwpaapa.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Kay.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Be careful, dude.

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: Careful? Was my mother careful when she stabbed me in the heart with a clothes hanger while I was still in ze womb?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: No! That's not Terrance or Phillip!

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: Oh... Alright, back you go.

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: It's so very cold...

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: We can't leave without you!

turns.speaker: THE MOLE
turns.text: It's okay, I am done for.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: No, I mean WE CAN'T LEAVE WITHOUT YOU - we don't know where the hell we are!!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Hey, dudes... Aren't you supposed to go to church, Kenny?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Kyle, check it out.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: This is terrible! This can't be happening!!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: We HAVE to see this movie, dude!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: That was sweet!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Where do they come up with this stuff?!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Thank my lucky stars Here before me now Is everything I'd ever hoped for Knew it in a word Saw it in a glance The only thing I think I'd die for...

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Aw, God Damn it, he's singing that fucking song again.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Woa, dude, who's your girlfriend's new guy?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: She's not my girlfriend, dude!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Now remember, don't tell anybody we saw the Terrance and Phillip movie!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Yeah, let's swear we won't tell!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Nowhere.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: I'VE heard them from Mr. Garrison a few times before...

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Yeah!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Dude, anybody who doesn't think Terrance and Phillip is funny can fuck off anyways.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Yeah...

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: OH MY GOD!! YOU KILLED KENNY!!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: YOU BASTARD!!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Oh my God! THEY killed Kenny!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: You bastards!!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: How can they do this?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: It isn't fair!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Dude, our moms arrested Terrance and Phillip!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Our moms suck!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Dude, let's help Terrance and Phillip!!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: How do we do that?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: What? What don't I get?  What don't I get?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: I don't know, dude.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: That British dickhole is what's taking Wendy away from me!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: I thought she wasn't your girlfriend, dude.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: She's Not! But if she WAS it would be THAT little asshole who's fucking it up for me!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Wow, dude. Wendy could really give a rats ass about you.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: I bet she would if my name was GREGORY!!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Good thing she was never your girlfriend... Dude, here comes Cartman.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Hey, Cartman, did they put that V-chip in your head or your ass?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: What's the difference?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Whoa!  What the hell was that?!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Dude!  It's the V-chip!  It shocks him ever time he cusses!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: This is sweet!!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Totally!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: I'm so sick of these soldiers.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Yeah, they suck.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Does it say what the clitoris is?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: All it says is that it's above the vulva... But where the hell is the vulva?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Isn't that in Arizona or something?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: It's only a matter of time before my mom has HIM burned too!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: What has the world come to? This is horrible. We're locked up, burning books, hating other people-

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: I don't know. But it has gone far enough! I'm sick of it! Something must be done! Change has got to come around! They're taking all our laughter and burning it to the ground! Can't you see what this is leading to? A world of chains and ties and glue! We have to fight before they've taken every one! Something must be done!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: I agree! The only way to save our future is to unite and fight! Something must be done! We must take action fast! My parents have gotten so strict they forgot they were children in the past!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Okay... I just need to find a few private message boards...

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Wait! Before we put a message out, do a search on the word 'clitoris'.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Okay...

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: "Found Eight Million Pages With the Word Clitoris"!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Wow!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: I'll just try the first one.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Dude, do you know what you're doing?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: No, dude, all you have to do is hit the keys really fast and say a bunch of stupid shit and it works.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Wow, a lot of people showed up.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Yeah, so what do we say?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: I thought you had something planned.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Me?!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Oh, brother.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Did you shut the alarm off, Cartman?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Stan!

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Dude, I found the clitoris! I think I can get Wendy to like me now!

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Sweet.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: WHAT?

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Are you sure, Kenny?

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Thank you, Kenny.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Yeah, thanks for going back to hell for us. You're a real pal.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Whew, I'm sure glad that's over.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Yeah, but you know, I learned something today.  I learned that getting all worked up over fuck and shit and cockmaster is just stupid... You all focused so hard on erasing profanity that you forgot the most important thing... To love each other.

turns.speaker: STAN
turns.text: Mom, I'm a man. Just a man. And I'm going to have fun with profanity just like you and dad did when you were little.

turns.speaker: KYLE
turns.text: Yeah, so what if you say uncle raper or dicksucker or, or-

turns.speaker: STAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: Oh dear God...

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: What is 'fisting'?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: I knew this would happen! Those bastard Canadians have now killed a child! Can't people see the damage that film is doing?!

turns.speaker: STAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: He was killed doing something he saw in the movie. It was Terrance and Phillip... THEY killed Kenny.

turns.speaker: STAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: Sheila, you're going to far! Those are YOUR children!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: YES! AND I WILL NOT ALLOW MY CHILDREN TO BE RUINED BY SMUT!!  I am sorry young man, but I have had it up to here! STRAP THEM IN!

turns.speaker: STAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: Oh Lord, what have we done...?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Wake up, people!  We all have to do things that aren't pretty sometimes! It's the not pretty things that make life worth fighting the not pretty things for! Why do you think children have to be born in hospitals?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: WHERE ARE YOU GOING?! We need to stop the not pretty things from letting our children be born in hospitals!

turns.speaker: STAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: We're going to find our boys! For God's sake Sheila, you almost had them killed!!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Shiteater-

turns.speaker: STAN'S MOTHER
turns.text: -Or monkey fucker-

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: My fellow Americans. I have led this fight in the War against profanity. I have founded Mothers Against Canada.  Our neighbor to the north has abused us for the last time.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: As Commander in chief, I have ordered our Army to set up defensive positions along the US-Canada border in anticipation of an attack.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: What about air strikes?

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Huh?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: We have to have air strikes on their military and entertainment centers.  It's the only way to ensure that their smut can't reach American soil!

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Oh, uh...  I don't know if air strikes are necessary.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Not necessary?!  Mr. President, may I remind you that our country's heart and soul are at stake, and our children's minds are the battlefield! The bastard Canadians want to fight us because we won't tolerate their potty mouths. Well, if it is war they want... THEN WAR THEY SHALL HAVE!!!

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Ma'am, we're tracking a resistance... It's probably Canadian spies!!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Well find out where that signal is coming from!  Then hunt them down like dogs! Any and all Canadian influence must be stopped at all cost!

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Yes ma'am!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: And Bill?

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Yes?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: I'm needing lunch.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Right away, ma'am!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: You're all part of Satan's army now!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: What the hell is going on?!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: I am the dark master!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Oh no you don't! This is MY fight!! I don't need your help, Alan Dershwitz!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: SILENCE!  I AM SATAN!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Oh.

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: YOU HAVE SPILLED THE BLOOD OF THE INNOCENTS. NOW THE WORLD BELONGS TO ME... NOW BEGINS TWO MILLION YEARS OF DARKNESS!!  AND ALL THANKS TO YOU!!!

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: Yes... And in doing so, you brought enough anger and intolerance to the world to allow my coming.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: And I thought my mother was the master of guilt.  Geez Louise.

turns.speaker: SATAN
turns.text: SILENCE!!!  NOW!!!  EVERYONE BOW DOWN TO ME!!!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Oh God... What have I done...

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: What did my son say, Principal Victoria? Did he say the S word?

turns.speaker: PRINCIPAL VICTORIA
turns.text: No, it was worse than that...

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: The F word?!

turns.speaker: PRINCIPAL VICTORIA
turns.text: No, worse. Here's a short list of the things they've been saying.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Terrance and Phillip MOVIE?! Oy gevalt! Not again!

turns.speaker: PRINCIPAL VICTORIA
turns.text: What is Terrance and Phillip?

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Terrance and Phillip are two VERY untalented, unfunny actors from Canada. Their TV show is filled with toilet humor and bad language and is just complete garbage.  Now it appears they have a movie and I'm positive it's not suitable for children!

turns.speaker: PRINCIPAL VICTORIA
turns.text: Well, it looks like I'll have to send a warning letter out to parents. I have to put a stop to this before MORE children see 'Terrance and Phillip'.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: We must take action on this immediately.

turns.speaker: PRINCIPAL VICTORIA
turns.text: Ooh yes. I think we'll have to give detention to those boys.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Forgive me for saying so, Principal Victoria, but your methods are too... Shall we say... soft?  As head of the PTA, I am exercising my right under article 42 of the PTA code.

turns.speaker: PRINCIPAL VICTORIA
turns.text: Article 42!  You don't mean-?!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Yes Principal Victoria.  The PTA is impeaching you.

turns.speaker: PRINCIPAL VICTORIA
turns.text: But I-

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: You are officially relieved of your duties as principal of this school!

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Uh, we're just, starting our program...

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: This is NOT a place for fun and games! This is rehabilitation! Now GET TO IT!! We at MAC have a trial to go to!

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: How is the children's progress?

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Very encouraging. Most of the children have been weened from their naughty mouths.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: What do you mean MOST, why not ALL?

turns.speaker: MR. MACKEY
turns.text: Well, some of the children just don't respond to 12 step programs.

turns.speaker: KYLE'S MOTHER
turns.text: Then we'll have to resort to plan B and call the v-chip organization.
